name: Orb (itch) (Declivever)
description:
Just a small game (5 minutes or so), where you collect Orbs. 
Two secret rooms, 25 Orbs to collect, and one powerup.

Controls

Use A/D to move left and right, press J to jump.

If you press ESC to enter the menu:

Use w and s to select options in the menu and J to select.  If using the web version Quit will crash the game. 

Please review so I can continue progress.

Sound, Music, and art assets Created by me, Declivever
Source Code and Game Assets inluded as a seperate download. 
Created with GoDot, Aesprite, BFXR. and Bosca Ceoil

Created for VimmJam 2020
https://itch.io/jam/vimjam
